document.title: UX Report: Arctic Data Center Metadata Editor
document.abstract: The University of Tennessee’s Center for Information and Communication Studies (CICS) conducted a remote usability study of the Arctic Data Center Metadata Editor (https://test.arcticdata.io/#share). This evaluation was supported by DataONE and is intended for product development. This report discusses the researcher’s findings and provides suggestions and recommendations for improvement.
document.publication-title: DataONE Sociocultural and Usability & Assessment Working Groups
